model:
<goal name="May Attract" ["Ticket Buyers"]"> <rule op="DEPENDENCY" to="<MJF>::"May Attract People" />
<rule op="DEPENDENCY" to="<MJF>::"Do Provide Promotion through Affilation and Event Sponsorship" />
<rule op="DEPENDENCY" to="<MJF>::"Do Provide Advertising Space" />
<rule op="DEPENDENCY" to="<MJF>::"Do Give Exclusive Rights" />
<rule op="DEPENDENCY" to="<MJF>::"Do Provide Free Tickets to Volunteers" />
<rule op="DEPENDENCY" to="<MJF>::"Do Provide Free Tickets to Sponsors" />
<rule op="DEPENDENCY" to="<MJF>::"Do Set Up MJF Venues" />
<goal name="Provide: Payment" ["Musical Revenue and Management"]"> <rule op="DEPENDENCY" to="<MJF>::"Do Pay for Musical Equipment_and Management" />
<goal name="Provide: Payment" [Concerts]"> <rule op="DEPENDENCY" to="<MJF>::"Do Pay Artists" />
<goal name="Provide: Payment" [Infrastructure]"> <rule op="DEPENDENCY" to="<MJF>::"Do Pay for Other Infrastructure" />
<rule op="DEPENDENCY" to="<MJF>::"Do Give Permission for Affiliated Festivals" />
<rule op="DEPENDENCY" to="<MJF>::"Do Provide Recordings to Montreux Sounds" />
<goal name="Provide: Revenue" [Products]"> <rule op="DEPENDENCY" to="<MJF>::"Do Pay for Products" />
<rule op="DEPENDENCY" to="<MJF>::"Provide: Technical Musical Equipment" />
<rule op="DEPENDENCY" to="<MJF>::"Do Pay Wage/Salary" />
<rule op="DEPENDENCY" to="<MJF>::"Technical Music Apects Be Managed" />

<goal name="<"Role MJF Artists">::"Technical Music Aspects Be Managed">
<goal name="<"Role MJF Covering Media">::"Do Play 'On' Festival Events">
<goal name="<"Role MJF Covering Media">::"Do Play Off Festival Events">
<goal name="<"Role MJF Covering Media">::"Do Put on 'On' Festival Events">
<goal name="<"Role MJF Visitor">::"Do Play 'On' Festival Events">
<goal name="<"Role MJF Visitor">::"Do Play Off Festival Events">
<goal name="<"Role MJF Visitor">::"Do Put on 'On' Festival Events">

<rule op="HELP" to="May Increase" ["Sponsorship Profit"]" />

<goal name="<MJF>::"May Attract People">
<rule op="MAKE" to="May Increase" ["Profit from Visitors"]" />
<goal name="<MJF>::"May Attract Sponsors"> <rule op="HELP" to="May Increase" ["Sponsorship Profit"]" />
<rule op="HELP" to="May Positive" ["MJF Brand and Franchise"]" />

<rule op="HELP" to="May Increase" ["Recordings Profit"]" />
